31.eng-name: The Book of Manumission of Slaves

hadiths.text: The tradition mentioned above has also been transmitted by Abu Qilabah from Abu Zaid through a different chain of narrators to the same effect:A man of the Ansar ... The Prophet (ﷺ) said: Had I been present before his burial, he would not have been buried in a Muslim cemetry

chapter.ara-name: باب فِيمَنْ أَعْتَقَ عَبِيدًا لَهُ لَمْ يَبْلُغْهُمُ الثُّلُثُ
chapter.eng-name: Regarding One Who Manumits Slaves Of His That Exceed One Third Of His Property
